description: abstracted landscape with bamboo grove at top, in green, brown and tan with dark black outlines; green expanse with jagged path in browns, grey and black at left; rocks and grey diamond shaped area at bottom at center and right, in blacks, greens, white and grey with black outlines
inscription: LRC, in pencil: 筧のある庭 {Kakei no aru niwa} | LLC, in pencil: 4/50 | Right margin: 橋本興家作 {Hashimoto Okiie saku}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hashimoto Okiie's Works (Hashimoto Okiie saku 橋本興家作)
title: Garden with A Gutter
